alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 22 at 2:03PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT/11 PM PDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of west central Idaho and Oregon, including the following areas, in west central Idaho, Boise Mountains, Upper Weiser River and West Central Mountains. In Oregon, Baker County, Malheur County and Oregon Lower Treasure Valley. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT/11 PM PDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Street flooding is also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms through this evening coupled with the rain that has already fallen could cause additional flooding. Locally heavy rain is possible in any stronger shower/thunderstorm. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
